messages.fileNotFound: Couldn't find file ${filePath}. Is the 'srcFolder' in your styleguide.json correct?
messages.fileNotRenderedDueToUnmatchingFolderName: WARNING: ${file} has not been rendered because it doesn't live in a folder with the same name.
messages.htmlValidationFailed: HTML validation failed. Most likely something went wrong with https://validator.w3.org/nu/. Maybe you also ran into rate limiting.
messages.missingFileExtension: Please specify the file extension of your components in styleguide.json (key: 'extension', type: String)
messages.missingComponentLocation: Please specify the location of your components in styleguide.json (key: 'srcFolder', type: String)
